mapper.select: select ammeter_usage as daily_use, read_date as dateline, 1 as water_type from t_ammeter_usage where ammeter_no = #{ammeterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo}
select sharp_usage as daily_use, read_date as dateline, 1 as water_type from t_ammeter_usage where ammeter_no = #{ammeterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo}
select peek_usage as daily_use, read_date as dateline, 1 as water_type from t_ammeter_usage where ammeter_no = #{ammeterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo}
select flat_usage as daily_use, read_date as dateline, 1 as water_type from t_ammeter_usage where ammeter_no = #{ammeterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo}
select low_usage as daily_use, read_date as dateline, 1 as water_type from t_ammeter_usage where ammeter_no = #{ammeterNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo}

select sum(ammeter_usage) from t_ammeter_usage where ammeter_no in( select ammeter_no from t_ammeter where c_id = #{cid} and is_delete = 0 ) and enprNo = #{enprNo}
and read_ts >= #{startLine} and read_ts <= #{endLine}
mapper.insert: insert into t_ammeter_usage( ammeter_no, ammeter_usage, sharp_usage, peek_usage, flat_usage, low_usage, read_date, read_ts, read_value, enprNo ) values ( #{ammeterNo}, #{ammeterUsage}, #{sharpUsage}, #{peekUsage}, #{flatUsage}, #{lowUsage}, #{readDate}, #{readTs} #{readValue}, #{enprNo} )
